import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2' const Categories = ({ Categories, onRemove }) => { const removeHandle = (id) => { Swal.fire({ title: 'Are you sure?', text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, delete it!' }).then((result) => { if (result.value) { onRemove(id) Swal.fire( 'Deleted!', 'Your file has been deleted.', 'success' ) } }) } return (
